content: These games are great! I've played grim legends 1, 2 and 3 and they get better and better!
Well done!
Playing for the third time. Still loving it. This series of games are my favorites
Excellent game play. Beautiful graphics. Love the story line. One of the better adventure games I've played.
Very good game.
Some of the minigames are hard
Really enjoyed this 3rd episode. Will play again.

I dont understand what is going on with this game and Grim Legends 2, but I am not able to see the full picture. It's like the settings are so high that it is getting cut off and I dont know how to bring it down in size. Very disappointing.
Great story and animation however, when I try to replay it doesn't work when I have to do the lock pick part in the first chapter making me uninstall the game and clear the datd

Playing this game is a lot of fun, the story is very good, graffics are detailed, music good to listen to, character interaction dialogue is helpful, puzzles are fairly easy to work out, all in all a game worth checking out.

Best hidden object game I've ever played. The plot is actually interesting. There's a fun mechanic where you "block" an opponent's attack; it's actually a mini-game, but it makes the game feel more interactive. The graphics are beautiful. TOTALLY worth the money.
Fun game, but buggy. It'll exit me out of an area before I've gotten everything, and then I can't go back.
One of best game I've played and I-10 a 10..easy pezy..
really enjoyed playing this game. wish it was longer but liked the hop's & the bonus game.
i do not like to hear my games and turn the sound off. i see no option for subtitles. i would like a refund.
very cool game nice graphics and great plot it has it all! #1
keeps me very intrested
love this game,cant wait to play the sequals
once i stop playing and start agian i have to start over
good game
I am enjoying this application as much as I did when I purchased it before. Challenging. I marked 4 stars because I decided to pay again and am frustrated.
Awesome game, puzzles are a tad bit easy but the graphics are beautiful!!

It is possible to make some puzzles unable to be solved. Some interaction scenes contain a collectable, and sometimes tapping the collectable to get it causes the scene to go away as if it were resolved, even if the item to solve it is still in your possession. This makes the interaction scene forever after unreachable, and therefore, unsolvable. This is still happening.

In the first scene, most of the time I can't move forward because I can't get to the lock or the cane. I love this game but it drives me crazy when i can't play it. I want to rate it 5 stars but i can't. Please fix it!!!
I enjoyed the game immensely it has a great story line and made sense to me start to finish!
Best yet from Artifex Mundi - look forward to more like this.

Its a good game I only gave it 4 stars because once i vot half way thdough 2 seperate times the game r Went back to the beginning. At time of this review i am also al.osg half way through and hoping i do not have the same issue
Nice game overall!
Been playing artifex games for years. This is one of the best.
A very nice HO. Not the best but still challenging and enjoyable.
Super fun game good challenges. Would have made a little easier if the back button would have been somewhere else. Overall highly recommended
Certainly a great game

Really enjoyed this game despite the dissimilarity from the previous two games. Graphics were beautiful, controls were seamless, and the story was very interesting to me. I appreciate AM trying to put a plot twist in the game. Definitely kept me immersed in the game play. I would recommend this game for all players.
Artifex Mundi has the most beautiful games!
Great game, good variety of puzzles and not too easy
I bought the game and now the hint button doesn't work???
Always liked these games,but this is annoying me,play the game,leave it and come back to it,and find it's gone right to the bloody beginning again.Anybody else getting this?
I like this game a lot. The graphics are beautiful and most of the games are doable 😃
Enjoying the game quite challenging
I would have given 5 stars if I wouldn't have to keep starting from the BEGINNING. I can't finish the game.
Good game for us questers
Thoroughly enjoyed the game should have added bonus game
I wish it is longer.High quality game, beautiful grafics and storyline.

Long and enjoyable game play. Loved it. Two requests; more give with the hidden picture. It was almost as if it had to be right on the center of the item and more diversity of characters, they all look white to me. I adore the Artifex Mundi games. Thanks for making them.
As always, I have enjoyed the game so far. And as always, I just wish it were longer. I'm addicted to these types of games. Artifex Mundi never seems to fail me.

I must say it's one of my favorites from Artifex Mundi.  Original story, great voice acting, plot twists and challenging minigames. My only sadness was that it wasn't longer. I found it so addictive I finished it in one day.
Another outstanding game from Artifex Mundi.  They are the company by which others should be judged.  Six long chapters and a nice bonus.  Good music and beautiful graphics.
My favorite

A really good, if somewhat short game. Can get through it in 2hrs if fast. Can be difficult to click on the hidden objects, not precise enough. Keeps on deleting all my progress, so I have to restart.
Love the game.. the graphics and the puzzle
Superb
Okay game. Similar to other Artifex Mundi ones. Graphics are nice. Music is good. Story is a bit shorter than others.
Excellent game
Great game has good p!aces to go
Beautiful graphics, well thought out games.
Best of the Grim Legends series, and thats high praise! Can't wait for number 4.
Very entertaining. I bought it before I played. I was just that certain ill love it
Just wish it was longer...loved it!

I loved GL1, hated GL2 so I wasn't sure what to expect.  Happy to say this was a great game.  The HOS were the kind I like where you are looking for parts to assemble into an object.  A good variety of mini games.  Story was well thought out and the secondary characters actually served a purpose.  Beautiful graphics and animation sequences.
Am really enjoying this game up to the moment. I just hope the thrill carries on

It's ok I was a little disappointed  in the storyline and some of the mini games to me this game was not as good as 1 and 2 I mean graphics were Amazing! But if that's all that's going for it? Idk I finished the game in a few hours so like I said it's ok just not my favorite... 1 and 2 remain for me the best.
This game has a good story, really kept me engaged. One of the better ones and well worth it if you can get it on sale

Second time I've played this game and still has me on the edge of my seat and unable to put it down till I know what happens next. All the great traits of a great movie, play, or in this case a five star game.
Really nice. Worth replaying.
Great storyline and voice acting, beautiful scenes, I had to hit Hint quite a bit on the HO scenes as they were a little blurry. Love the music too.
It was great and I  enjoyed it.
Lots of interactive HOS and puzzles to do. Played on easy mode so map very useful as a guide
Awesome
Awesome game! Have not stopped playing it once I started. Good mix of puzzles as well
Crashes and starts me from the beginning. Love the game otherwise! Thank you!

Okay but not great. I found myself only playing a few minutes at a time then getting bored....just went through the motions to finish. Very few hidden object areas (although good ones when they were there), otherwise I found the fetch quests relentless and at times illogical. I play a LOT of HOGs and I expect a bit more from expert mode. Hint button recharged too fast, and why not have the rune 'fights' with a timed aspect to it - I got distracted but it just waited for me to pick one.
I paid twice after realizing. I have already played it before and take the demo. I only took the full version
Above average voice acting. Good story. Quite engrossing
Artifex mundi are the best
Loved it.
As expected, this was a great game like the other 2 grim legends
Its A.M. they speak 4 themselves

Always liked the Grim ledgends series.   This one is up today part with the rest.  A guide would be helpful but you can make it through without one.  Just some areas I don't know what to do do.   The map is good, but I am using the hint button more than I would like.  Great game.  Worth the money.
Rallye like it . Not hard tout play

Love all the grim legends games keep them coming. Storyline is great along with voices, music and graphics all worth purchasing the games do get harder as you play but who doesn't like a good challenge
Could have been a bit more challenging by not saying specifically what was needed  (on hard level) but overall pretty good, I enjoyed it.
It looks like a good time.
Amazing!!  I absolutely love it!  I have all 3 now and absolutely love all 3 of the Grim Legend stories!!  Please keep more and more Grim Legend tales comming!!

Beautiful graphics, smooth game play with puzzles, mini games and HOS that integrate seamlessly with the storyline. It's becoming something of a trademark with Artifex Mundi games. I was completely invested in the characters and story. I only wish was that it was a bit longer!
I like this game a lot but am continually started over in my progress. It does not save progress past 2 days of gameplay. I am also having trouble contacting support for this.

Another great one from Artifex Mundi. Although they seem to have similar story lines, they are all different enough to get you caught up in each one. I play themto over and over to get them right. Great story lines, terrific graphics,can't stop playing them. PLEASE keep them coming!

With great FMVs, good voice work and a reasonable story, this app is well worth your time and money. Sure, puzzles get too hard later on, but I don't play this type of game to be stumped. It's a long game as well, lasting upwards of ten hours, as long as you actually try to work out puzzles and not use the hint too much. Not as good as Enigmatis 2, the Mists of Ravenwood, but that is their flagship title!
Love all the Grim legends so far!  Keep them coming please, deffo recommend u start from number 1

... from this dev! I've played quite a few of their games and this was one I knew 5 minutes into playing that I was going to purchase the full version. AND - it's on sale right now (hint, hint)!! Great game 😁

This Game was well worth the price to play!  Great story addition and bonus game.  Lots of great puzzles and graphics, no glitches, and the accompanying music was not annoying!  Hours of fun interaction! Yay!  5 stars!

Usually I love Artifex Mundi with their great story lines and effects. I only use Artifex Mundi. However I got to chapter 6 near the end and got kicked off and now I have to start over again. I feel like uninstalling it. It's now stuck and I have to start a new user. This has really annoyed me.
Good graphics, storyline and mini games.  Liked it.
Have been quite a big fan of artifex mundi. Bought and downloaded many of their games before.
Long storyline, amazing array of puzzles. Well, well worth the money!
Great game
Tried it while on sale. Enjoying it.
Excellent. 😃

I am a big fan of AM and bought most of its games and this is by far the one I enjoyed the most. Graphic is phenomenal, very detailed with beautiful coloring, story is incredibly interesting with different chapters, games and puzzles were also not that easy, everything is just perfect. This deserves 6 stars!!
I am up to level 4 and have had no problems and I am enjoying the game. Only 4 stars because if I give you 5 you will think your too smart and stop trying to improve
App crashes and freezes. Can't play at all!
Very enjoyable game. 1st one I've played that makes sense all the way. Music is pleasant and graphics are superior. Well worth your time and money.

The grim legends series has been great! The graphics have been improved again and again and this latest one is fabulous. Wow! They changed up some of the interactions and it is refreshing. The story is ok for the most part but everything else really really shines. Fantastic job. My favorite so far has been grim legends 2, dark swan but as I said the entire series is awesome. Looking forward to the next iteration in the series! Great job artifex and team!!
Fun to play and many places to explore.  It kept me guessing what would happen next

Ability to combine items for use, puzzles are different from other games I've played, find the shape type hidden object games.  All in all great game.  I came across a puzzle that even though I think I had it right I had to use skip to get past it. (The one that you used the photo negative to get the pattern..yes I remembered it was a negative.) Edit: solved it second time through.
One if the best of these kind of games. Good story, puzzles and art.
Well worth the price
Fun story
Very well done
Has hints and a map. Hidden object scenes are of the type where you find parts that assemble into an item of use.
Love it, great graphics, great stories so far!!
Bought this when it was on sale & well worth it. AM makes the best games like this & this title is no different. Very enjoyable!

Brilliant. Just the kind of adventure I enjoy. It makes it so much better when you can see characters reacting together. Plus not too many hidden object puzzles. They become so tedious after a while in some of the games. Even revisiting them up to three times. Overkill. This is much more a proper story. Beautifully drawn too. Better value for money. More like this please.
its great so far
I am really enjoying this so far, great value, lots of different puzzles and a good storyline.
I saw the game was on sale so I purchased it before playing the free trial, I even have the text receipt, but it's saying I didn't purchase it. Please fix and then I'll give 5stars

I haven't enjoyed an Artifex Mundi game so much since Mists of Ravenwood. The last couple I've played, it seems like they are growing as a company. The graphics are fantastic, the storyline is great, and I feel stupid the number of times I had to use the hint button. For a while there, all Artifex games were very similar, but they appear to be breaking from that mold. Simple things like combining items and allowing some interactions beyond point and click are making a huge difference.
Won't download n won't refund neither.... Never again!  Want refund now.
Brilliant. Loved this game from beginning to end.
Very well done! Needs more puzzles, less talk.
I would like a refund. I did not at all enjoy the game.
Great game the only thing is it was too short but I would like to see a follow up to this one
this is the second game that i download from artifex mundi that does not play or even open. i ve only waisted my money
When I played this half way through and shut down my tablet for a while... then lost my save when open this game again...
Nice game. Enjoyed it. Would of got 5 stars if it was longer
I play grim lagends 2 and that was awesome but this one kinda short and to easy, well this one have more great graphic but still I hope more for this game
I'm really enjoying this, wonderful, love my mystery games.
Good enhanced grafics love the video scenes during the game l shall keep it on my Phone worth every penny thanks
Not up to artifex standards kind of short plus some of the actions were unclear. Will get more games from you
So well done. Graphics are amazing and the story is my favorite so far. Well done.

Lots of puzzles, very few ordinary HOs.  Some familiar, some innovative, some head-scratchers and the hint button recharges in 1 second.  Very good graphics and storyline, including the extra episode - which has all new puzzles, unlike most.  The puzzles are story-related and keep it moving.  Kudos to the devs at A.F.
Enjoy the game. Nice story line & graphic
Woahhh graphics improved. Storyline the best! Ow i love artifex mundi. They gratify my gaming passion. Hahaha
